product_overview: Studiotreiax is a comprehensive multimedia content creation and editing platform focused on corporate and educational training. It integrates advanced AI, video processing, 3D avatars, and automated PowerPoint-to-video conversion to streamline content production and ensure regulatory compliance.
core_goals: Automate and accelerate the creation of professional training videos from existing materials.
Provide seamless integration of AI technologies to analyze and optimize educational content.
Offer a professional-grade video editor with timeline, effects, and real-time rendering capabilities.
Support 3D avatars with facial animation synchronized to TTS for engaging narration.
Ensure full compliance with regulatory standards through a comprehensive template library.
Deliver a scalable, high-performance platform responsive across devices, ready for cloud deployment.
key_features: Complete authentication system with Supabase Auth and JWT management.
Automated PowerPoint presentation to video conversion using AI analysis.
Multi-provider Text-to-Speech system with ElevenLabs, Google Cloud TTS, Azure Speech, and automatic fallback.
Advanced video editor featuring timeline management, effects, transitions, and real-time rendering.
3D avatar system with Ready Player Me integration and lip-sync animation.
Robust project management with CRUD operations, versioning, collaboration, and organization.
Library of templates focused on norms and regulatory compliance (NR).
Performance monitoring including Web Vitals with automatic optimization and alerts.
Notification system with customizable smart notification center.
Analytics module for user tracking and engagement insights.
API backend with middleware, validation, and real-time websockets support.
Mobile responsiveness and adaptive navigation with semantic search and recommendations.
Comprehensive testing suite covering unit, integration, and E2E testing.
user_flow_summary: User authentication via secure login or registration using Supabase Auth.
Project creation, editing, and version control with collaboration features.
Upload and validate multimedia files with preview capabilities.
Convert PowerPoint presentations to video with AI-powered slide analysis.
Edit videos in a professional timeline editor applying effects, transitions, and integrating TTS narration with 3D avatar animations.
Manage notification preferences and receive contextual alerts.
Access analytics dashboards to monitor usage, engagement, and performance metrics.
Utilize templates for regulatory compliance and customize assets as needed.
Navigate adaptively with semantic search and personalized content recommendations.
Use offline-first features and mobile-optimized views to work across devices.
validation_criteria: Authentication must be secure with JWT tokens and support user management through Supabase.
Automated PPTX to video conversion should complete within 3 minutes with at least 95% success rate.
TTS quality scores should exceed 8.5/10 across all supported providers with seamless fallback.
Video editor performs real-time rendering with latency under 50ms for synchronization between audio and visuals.
Performance metrics such as FCP under 2.5s and API response times below 300ms consistently met.
System coverage with unit, integration, and E2E tests should surpass 80%.
Compliance templates must correctly identify and validate regulatory norms with over 95% accuracy.
Platform maintains 99% uptime with secure rate limiting, input validation, and detailed security logging.
User satisfaction feedback scores remain above 4.0 out of 5.
Mobile responsiveness adapts seamlessly with under 3 second load times on common devices.
